title: Function Structure
content: Remember that a function needs to **return** a value, not just print it. Use the `return` keyword to send back your greeting string.

title: String Capitalization
content: Python strings have a `.capitalize()` method that makes the first letter uppercase and the rest lowercase. Try: `name.capitalize()`

title: f-string Formatting
content: Use an f-string to combine text and variables: `f"Hello, {variable}!"`

title: Complete Solution Pattern
content: The solution follows this pattern: `return f"Hello, {name.capitalize()}!"`
